long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is News Scrolls

News should be truthful and unbiased – At News Scrolls we collects news from world’s most biggest and trusted news channels and publishers and present them in an endless scrolls format. Here all our effort is to develop one simplest news portal where you can find all important news and stories around the globe that matter most to you.

Visual Experience

We present news in an endless scrolls manner. At News Scrolls one can search by Regions vs Publications vs News types, News also features Top Stories which will provide breaking news across the globe. Here you can access to world famous Magazine and Blogs on the subjects you care most.

News Sources & Publications

One can explore a huge selection of news and stories from top news organizations and publications. Choose the ones you want to add to your favorites so you can get the news that interests you — like business, technology, fashion, sports, and more. Read world famous Magazine and Blogs on the topic you like.

Configure your news

At News Scrolls, we show news based on viewers Geo region but at any time one can view more relevant news topics by exploring various news options. Soon we are coming with the options where one can configure and save favorite news topics

Download News Scrolls and get started today—it’s free!
